### Florida Wing Winter Encampment
**Dec 2022 – Jan 2023 | Camp Blanding, Florida**  
*Role: Basic Cadet*

Foundational military training in excellence, discipline, and leadership. Structured classes, drill and ceremony, physical fitness, military exercises. Established disciplinary foundation and deep understanding of CAP structure and military culture.

:::

### Kentucky Wing Encampment
**2025 | Wendell H. Ford, Kentucky**  
*Role: Cadet Training Officer & Public Affairs Officer*

Developed and taught leadership classes to fellow cadets on advanced topics. Captured, edited, and managed photography for squadron media. Coordinated comprehensive squadron communications and media efforts. Gained expertise in training delivery and professional media relations.

:::

### Ohio Wing Summer Encampment
**2025 | Wright-Patterson AFB, Ohio**  
*Role: ATS Flight Commander*

Led aerospace training flight in hands-on STEM activities including rocket building and flight simulator training. Selected as 1 of 2 Flight Commanders for the full-motion C-17 simulator demonstration at Wright-Patterson Air Force Base. Advanced leadership experience with cutting-edge aerospace technology.
